thread.title: 4 Lesser Known Make-Up Brands, With Great Quality Products, You Can Use For Your Wedding
thread.title_full: 4 Lesser Known Make-Up Brands, With Great Quality Products, You Can Use For Your Wedding

title: 4 Lesser Known Make-Up Brands, With Great Quality Products, You Can Use For Your Wedding
text:
facebook 277 SHARES 
Make-up loving/conscious brides, this one's for you. If you love make-up, and take a great deal of pride in always looking on fleek, then we're sure these insights will greatly help you with your wedding ensemble. If that's the case, here are some lesser-known make-up brands, with amazing quality products, to try at your wedding. A video posted by SUVA BEAUTY (@suvabeauty) on Dec 31, 2016 at 6:44am PST 
With unique products, like Hydraliners - eyeliner pots that are ready to use with the addition of water, and in around 30 shades, and super pigmented butter shadows, eye make-up is a dream with Suva Beauty. A few of our favorites for a flawless look that lasts all day âœ¨ #lagirlcosmetics A photo posted by L.A. Girl Cosmetics (@lagirlcosmetics) on Dec 28, 2016 at 3:40pm PST 
Underrated beauty brand, L.A. Girl, has some amazing face products and great eyeliners, and eye shadows as well. Since it's available on Nykaa, it's also easy to get your hands on. A photo posted by Milani Cosmetics (@milanicosmetics) on Jan 5, 2017 at 1:01pm PST 
Milani has a whole roster of amazing products, starting from their Amore Matte Lip Creme to their Fierce Foil Eyeshine, so it can be a one-stop shop for your wedding needs. A photo posted by NYX Professional Makeup (@nyxcosmetics) on Feb 7, 2017 at 8:29pm PST 
Available at Sephora India, a recently opened store in Mumbai, as well as on Nykaa, Nyx Cosmetics is on its way to becoming a recognised brand. And with good reason. Pretty much all of their products, from their lipsticks to eyeliners and concealer, are pigmented and long-lasting. Image credit: Instagram
